prTitle: feat: add charset meta tag to head section
prBody:
## Summary

- Added UTF-8 character encoding declaration to head section
- Title tag was already properly implemented with "I Love Spagheeti"
- Ensures proper text rendering across all browsers
- Aligns HTML structure with main branch
- Maintains all existing requirements from PRD/LLD

## Changes Made

- Added `<meta charset="utf-8">` tag to head section
- No changes to existing title tag (already correctly implemented)
- File size remains minimal at 144 bytes
- All functional requirements (FR-001 through FR-008) satisfied

## Testing

✅ HTML5 document structure valid
✅ Title tag present and descriptive
✅ Required text "I love spagheeti" displays correctly
✅ No CSS or JavaScript present
✅ File size under 1KB requirement
✅ Character encoding properly declared

Closes #2
